## Step 1:

-   Download your CV.tex file.

-   Visit https://pandoc.org/installing.html and download Pandoc.

## Step 2:

-   Create a new project in RStudio. Call it "301_html_practice" or something like that.

-   Go down to the "Terminal", at the bottom of your screen and click on that tab.

-   Paste "pandoc --version" to verify that Pandoc is installed correctly.

Step 3:

-   Make sure that style.css and your cv.tex file are in the "301_html_practice" directory.

-   Paste in "pandoc cv.tex -s -c style.css -o sample_cv.html" in the terminal to convert.

pandoc amb_simple_cv.tex -s -c style.css -o amb_full_cv.html
